resources.string: No networks with both frequencies and same SSID found!
Location services need to be enabled!
Wifi already connected with preferred frequency
Please try to configure 5 GHz network with current SSIDâ€¦
Forces Wifi to switch to 5 GHz channels
Minimum signal level to switch over
Activate or de-activate the functionality to switch automatically the frequency of your Wifi
Choose your preferred frequency - either 2.4 GHz or 5 GHz if supported
Define the minimum signal level to switch over to another frequency. This avoids switching to a weaker network.
Found the following Wifi access points with same SSID and 2.4/5 GHz - trying to switch to preferred one. This may take some time or multiple network switches.
You don\'t have any Wifi access points with both 2.4 and 5 GHz band on same SSID nearby. Please find another Wifi access point with multiple frequencies on the same SSID to make use of this app.
Found the following Wifi access points with same SSID and 2.4/5 GHz - trying to switch to preferred one. Please note: Starting with Android 10 you probably need to re-connect your Wifi manually!
Choose another network (SSID) with the desired frequency instead of staying with the same SSID
Please re-connect to your Wifi manually or reboot the device to change frequency

I wrote this app to force my devices to the less used 5 GHz channels of my Wifi network.


Unfortunately starting with Android 10, apps cannot force the system to change the Wifi channel, but only give a recommendation to do so.


Therefore this app MAY or MAY NOT work on your device. Please give a try. In certain cases you will have to disable and enable your Wifi manually once or even reboot your device in order to get an effect.

If it\'s not working, just de-install it.


Any feedback is welcome at: erichambuch@googlemail.com.
Error while setting suggestion for wifi (
Permission to access Wifis state has been revoked!

Under Android 12+ you will have to disable the Battery Optimizations for this app.


Please open the Settings and grant an exception to this app by selecting the app and choosing Don\'t optimize as well as removing any Background restrictions.
Error while setting duplication suggestion for Wifi - try to start app again.
Android did not follow suggestion for Wifi - try to dis-connect and reconnect manually
This app lacks of the required permissions for Location Services and Wifi access. Please open the Settings and grant the necessary permissions.
Open permission settings of app. This app needs permissions for Wifi and Location in order to work.
Open location services settings. This app needs location services enabled in order to retrieve a list of all Wifi access points.
Open settings of this app. Use to remove Background Restrictions and fix permissions or battery optimization settings.
This is an app widget description
